cells.data:
D. Ben Knoble

- Designed and implemened a build tool to cache and reuse artifacts with information from `git` and `make`
- Identified and realized an opportunity for parallel builds, reducing overall build time by $\approx \frac{1}{3}$
- Assisted in converting to Docker-based builds
- Researched & designed a proposal to cluster lab PXE server to reduce single point of failures
